languages.text: Века назад на Кьяве Гамма проводились литургии сборки и первого запуска зажигания грандиозных стальных монстров — всесокрушающих горных проходчиков, могучих грузовых тягачей и прожорливых мега-комбайнов. Ныне это благочестивое ремесло утрачено, но ремесленники Механикус могут возродить его. И триумфальные гудки сирен вновь сотрясут Простор Коронус!

traits.locale_text: Расконсервация заброшенной двести лет назад фабрики Механикус по производству мега-машин.

languages.text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Adeptus Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!
languages.original_text: Века назад на Кьяве Гамма проводились литургии сборки и первого запуска зажигания грандиозных стальных монстров — всесокрушающих горных проходчиков, могучих грузовых тягачей и прожорливых мега-комбайнов. Ныне это благочестивое ремесло утрачено, но ремесленники Механикус могут возродить его. И триумфальные гудки сирен вновь сотрясут Простор Коронус!

traits.locale_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic monsters of steel: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

This virtuous craft is lost now, but Adeptus Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Adeptus Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

languages.text: Hace siglos, las liturgias de ensamblaje y de primera ignición fueron celebrados en Kiava Gamma para diversos monstruos enormes de acero: tuneladoras que aplastan montañas, poderosos transportes de carga y megacosechadoras voraces. Aunque el proceso que produce esta clase de creaciones ha sido olvidado, los artesanos del Mechanicus podrían revivirlo. ¡Y una vez más el triunfal estruendo de sus bocinas hará temblar la Extensión de Koronus!
languages.original_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

traits.locale_text: Hace siglos, las liturgias de ensamblaje y de primera ignición fueron celebrados en Kiava Gamma para diversos monstruos enormes de acero: tuneladoras que aplastan montañas, poderosos transportes de carga y megacosechadoras voraces. Aunque el proceso que produce esta clase de creaciones ha sido olvidado, los artesanos del Mechanicus podrían revivirlo. ¡Y una vez más el triunfal estruendo de sus bocinas hará temblar la Extensión de Koronus!

languages.text: Il y a des siècles, sur Kiava Gamma, des liturgies d'assemblage et de mise en service se tenaient en l'honneur de majestueux monstres d'acier : des tunneliers briseurs de montagnes, des transporteurs titanesques et des méga-moissonneuses voraces. Ce savoir-faire sacré est désormais perdu, mais les artisans du Mechanicus sont capables de le faire renaître. Alors, les appels triomphants des cornes d'alerte résonneront à nouveau dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus !
languages.original_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

traits.locale_text: Il y a des siècles, sur Kiava Gamma, des liturgies d'assemblage et de mise en service se tenaient en l'honneur de majestueux monstres d'acier : des tunneliers briseurs de montagnes, des transporteurs titanesques et des méga-moissonneuses voraces. Ce savoir-faire sacré est désormais perdu, mais les artisans du Mechanicus sont capables de le faire renaître. Alors, les appels triomphants des cornes d'alerte résonneront à nouveau dans toutes les Étendues de Koronus !

languages.text: 几个世纪之前，基亚瓦伽马星曾为这些雄伟的钢铁怪兽举行过组装仪式和首次点火仪式。勇往直前的山地隧道挖掘机、巨力无匹的货物运输机，以及永不餍足的大型收割机在那颗行星不舍昼夜地工作。这种精妙的技艺已经失传，但机械修会的工匠师可让它重获新生。届时，胜利的号角将再次奏响科罗努斯扩区！
languages.original_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Adeptus Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

traits.locale_text: 几个世纪之前，基亚瓦伽马星曾为这些雄伟的钢铁怪兽举行过组装仪式和首次点火仪式。勇往直前的山地隧道挖掘机、巨力无匹的货物运输机，以及永不餍足的大型收割机在那颗行星不舍昼夜地工作。这种精妙的技艺已经失传，但机械修会的工匠师可让它重获新生。届时，胜利的号角将再次奏响科罗努斯扩区！

languages.text: 何世紀も前、キアヴァ・ガンマでは壮大な鋼鉄の怪物、すなわちすべてを粉砕する山岳トンネル掘削機、強大な貨物運搬船、貪欲なメガハーベスターの組み立てと最初の点火の儀式が執り行われた。この高潔な技術は今や失われてしまったが、帝国技術局の職人たちなら復活させることができるだろう。そして再び、勝利の轟音がコロヌス・エクスパンスを震撼させるだろう！
languages.original_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

traits.locale_text: 何世紀も前、キアヴァ・ガンマでは壮大な鋼鉄の怪物、すなわちすべてを粉砕する山岳トンネル掘削機、強大な貨物運搬船、貪欲なメガハーベスターの組み立てと最初の点火の儀式が執り行われた。この高潔な技術は今や失われてしまったが、帝国技術局の職人たちなら復活させることができるだろう。そして再び、勝利の轟音がコロヌス・エクスパンスを震撼させるだろう！

languages.text: Vor Jahrhunderten wurden auf Kiava Gamma für majestätische Stahlmonster Liturgien der Versammlung und ersten Zündung abgehalten: für alles zertrümmernde Tunnelgräber, für mächtige Lastenträger und für hungrige Mega-Erntemaschinen. Diese virtuose Kunst ist heute in Vergessenheit geraten, doch Mechanicus-Artifexe können sie wiederbeleben. Dann wird wieder der triumphale Klang der Sirenen die Koronus-Ausdehnung erbeben lassen!
languages.original_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!

traits.locale_text: Vor Jahrhunderten wurden auf Kiava Gamma für majestätische Stahlmonster Liturgien der Versammlung und ersten Zündung abgehalten: für alles zertrümmernde Tunnelgräber, für mächtige Lastenträger und für hungrige Mega-Erntemaschinen. Diese virtuose Kunst ist heute in Vergessenheit geraten, doch Mechanicus-Artifexe können sie wiederbeleben. Dann wird wieder der triumphale Klang der Sirenen die Koronus-Ausdehnung erbeben lassen!

languages.text: Asırlar evvel heybetli çelik devler için Kiava Gama'da montaj ve ilk yakım ayinleri yapılırdı. Her şeyi ezebilen dağ delicileri, koca kargo taşıyıcıları ve doymak bilmez yüce biçerler bunlardan bazılarıydı. Adeptus Mechanicus zanaatkârları, mazide kalmış bu erdem işini geri getirebilir. Sonrasında Koronus Enginliği, klaksonların zafer naralarıyla bir kez daha titreyecektir!
languages.original_text: Centuries ago, liturgies of assembly and first ignition were held on Kiava Gamma for majestic steel monstrosities: all-crushing mountain tunnellers, mighty cargo haulers, and voracious mega-harvesters. This virtuous craft is lost now, but Adeptus Mechanicus artisans can revive it. Then, once again, triumphant calls of klaxons will shake the Koronus Expanse!
